296.label: I am willing to put my child's desires ahead of my own.

items.text: I am willing to put my child's desires ahead of my own.

items.text: When my child refuses to obey or does something she/he is not supposed to, it's because he/she is trying to annoy me.

298.label: I feel that childcare and bringing takes up all of my time and dominates my life.

items.text: When I am with my child, there’s nothing I would rather be doing.

items.text: How frequently do the following things occur?

items.text: I tend to be strict with my child.

items.text_de: Ich tröste dieses Kind, wenn es traurig ist.
items.text: I comfort my child when he/she feels sad.

316.label: I feel that my child is ungrateful because he/she disobeys.

items.text: I feel that my child is ungrateful because he/she disobeys.
